abstract: The S.E.C. didn't like a Netflix post on Facebook. | Peter Lattman followed a trail of insider cases to SAC Capital Advisors. | Citigroup said it would cut 11,000 jobs. | Warren E. Buffett sat down for an interview with Andrew Ross Sorkin. | Five firms were charged over audits in China. | A trader at Morgan Stanley faces an inquiry on a possible manipulation. | UBS is reported to be near a deal on rate rigging.

headline.main: Week in Review: Gatorade, Michael Jordan and Insider Trading
